::Zardus::

Zardus stops as he gets Composer's comm, though it had a good amount of static in it because of the material of the ship that he was in. He taps his comm to reply.

"Yes. Get a shuttle and report to my coordinates. Bring weapons and some advanced scanners," he says into the comm and then proceeds again, keeping his gun aimed forward.

"Any more luck with the scanners?" he asks Wheeljack without turning his head.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack/Hurricane:::
> 
> ::They continue to follow Zardus::
